column2: The  plaintiff-respondent submits that as such the core issue

column1: is whether the separate surveys carried  out by the two surveyors referred
to as X and Y in the appeal brief,  relate to one and the same land or if not
they  are  in  respect  of  two  separate  lands.

column2: becomes the all important question to  be determined by this Court as per

column1: the  directive  given  to  Counsel  that written  submissions are  to  be  limited
to assisting Court to determine the said matter only.
